H0.text: Which famous huntsman who was known for wearing a grey coat was buried in Caldbeck cemetery. Peter Corbett

H1.text: Which famous huntsman who was known for wearing a grey coat was buried in Caldbeck cemetery. George Osbaldeston

H2.text: Which famous huntsman who was known for wearing a grey coat was buried in Caldbeck cemetery. Thomas Assheton Smith

H3.text: Which famous huntsman who was known for wearing a grey coat was buried in Caldbeck cemetery. John Peel

A4.text: He died on 1 August 1866 in St John's Wood, London and was buried in the Williams family grave on the west side of Highgate Cemetery (plot no.11014).
